Class PlayerSpriteDecorator

java.lang.Object
sprites.AnimatedSprite
sprites.player.PlayerSprite
sprites.player.PlayerSpriteDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerDeath, PlayerHeal, PlayerRush, PlayerSlash
public abstract class PlayerSpriteDecorator extends PlayerSprite
Abstract player sprite decorator to augment the sprite and animation
